EmailTemplate.description: Thank you for registering notification sent to all attendees
EmailTemplate.name: PD Day - OK - 2007
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation of Training Registration on 5/23/07
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering!
You've been registered for the Oklahoma Professional Development Day?
Date: 23-May-07 Time: 8:30 - 4:00 Location: David L. Boren Student Union at The University of Oklahoma Health Sciences Center 1106 North Stonewall, Suite 300 Oklahoma City, OK 73117-1200 Directions: http://www.amsa.com/fap/training/locations_midwest.cfm#ouhsc (Pre-paid parking available in lot K)
Canceling Your Registration If you need to cancel or change your training registration please email training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099.
Other Information All of ASA's training programs are offered free of charge. Please contact us at training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099 with any questions about our training program.
We look forward to seeing you!
